lead_paragraph: The payrolls processor ADP said private sector employment rose by 257,000 last month, the largest gain since December 2014.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Private Hiring Was Strong in December, ADP Says
headline.main: Private Sector Hiring Increased in December

snippet: The payrolls processor ADP said private sector employment rose by 257,000 last month, the largest gain since December 2014.
abstract: Payrolls processor ADP reports private sector employment rose by 257,000 in December 2015, suggesting underlying strength in economy despite signs of slowed growth in fourth quarter.
